text: 22:20 Josua 7:1-26Ia bizir Seran otarim Akan amizim bakɨnɨghnɨghan markɨ! Ikiavɨra Itir God e mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia Jerikon nguibar ekiam bar a gasɨghasɨkigh.” Ezɨ Akan Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Akar Gavgavim batoke. Kamaghɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir God osɨmtɨzir ekiam isa, bar moghɨra e ganɨngi. Akan uan arazir kuram bagha areme, ezɨ Israelian igharaziba uaghan an amizir arazir kurar kam bangɨn me ariaghire.’ ”
